statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ -8 \\ 6 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -30 \\ -16 \\ 14 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 6 \\ -12 \\ -9 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
